body:
Comment 12 by **skip.tavakkolian**: 
Hi Dave, Russ,

The original problem is fixed; but now i get something strange with interpretation of
literal strings:


$ ./bb0
0 [invalid string] 49
1 [invalid string] 50
2 [invalid string] 51
3 [invalid string] 52
4 [invalid string] 53
5 [invalid string] 54
$ ./bb1
0 [invalid string] 49
1 [invalid string] 50
2 [invalid string] 51
3 [invalid string] 52
4 [invalid string] 53
$ ./bb2
0 = 49 [invalid string] 49 [invalid string] 49
1 = 50 [invalid string] 50 [invalid string] 50
2 = 51 [invalid string] 53 [invalid string] 51
3 = 52 [invalid string] 54 [invalid string] 52
4 = 53 [invalid string] 53 [invalid string] 53
5 = 54 [invalid string] 54 [invalid string] 54
$ 5g -V
5g version weekly.2011-04-13 8132

I tried changing from println to fmt.Println in bb0; this produces a fault (below), but
i think it is the same thing that is causing [invalid string] when using println.  i'm
going to look further tomorrow but wanted to let you know that at least the original
issue of 1240 is fixed.


$ ./fmt_bb0
unexpected fault address 0x6c4cbf
throw: fault

[signal 0xb code=0x1 addr=0x6c4cbf pc=0x1de1c]

[0x400b4be0] runtime.throw+0x40 /home/fst/go/src/pkg/runtime/runtime.c:102
	runtime.throw(0xce6be, 0x6c4cbf)
[0x400b4bec] runtime.sigpanic+0xc0 /home/fst/go/src/pkg/runtime/linux/thread.c:294
	runtime.sigpanic()
[0x400b4c1c] memhash+0x3c /home/fst/go/src/pkg/runtime/runtime.c:355
	memhash(0xb2202, 0x6c4cbf, 0x10764)
[0x400b4c28] strhash+0x38 /home/fst/go/src/pkg/runtime/runtime.c:445
	strhash(0x8, 0x400b4c88, 0x0)
[0x400b4c4c] hash_insert+0x40 /home/fst/go/src/pkg/runtime/hashmap.c:460
	hash_insert(0x501030a0, 0x400b4c88, 0x400b4c64, 0x8)
[0x400b4c68] runtime.mapassign+0x98 /home/fst/go/src/pkg/runtime/hashmap.c:876
	runtime.mapassign(0x501030a0, 0x400b4c88, 0x400b4c90, 0x400b4c90)
[0x400b4c80] runtime.mapassign1+0x60 /home/fst/go/src/pkg/runtime/hashmap.c:910
	runtime.mapassign1(0x501030a0, 0x6c4cbf)
[0x400b4f34] unicode.init+0x1c40 /home/fst/go/src/pkg/unicode/casetables.go:317
	unicode.init()
[0x400b4fc0] fmt.init+0x78 /home/fst/go/src/pkg/fmt/scan.go:1084
	fmt.init()
[0x400b4fc8] main.init+0x70 /home/fst/test/issue1240_weekly.2011-04-13.8132/fmt_bb0.go:8
	main.init()
[0x400b4fd0] runtime.mainstart+0x8 /home/fst/go/src/pkg/runtime/arm/asm.s:65
	runtime.mainstart()
[0x400b4fd0] runtime.goexit /home/fst/go/src/pkg/runtime/proc.c:178
	runtime.goexit()
----- goroutine created by -----
_rt0_arm+0x7c /home/fst/go/src/pkg/runtime/arm/asm.s:52
$
